name: Narcotic Empire (Early-Alpha)
description:
Current stage of development : Early-Alpha

This is the updated version of my LD34 Game "Weed: The incremental Game" I'm slowly going to be updating it over time with new features as well as models animations and so on , so if you have any feedback please feel free to leave it in the ratings below or message me on twitter at @Wicked7000

Thanks for downloading

Controls:

  • Click - On structures as well as dealers (The cubes) to see more information about them
  • Mouse drag - click and drag the mouse to rotate the camera view
  • WASD - Use these to change the perspective (keep in mind its a tad buggy atm)
  • Space - Reset Camera

- Jason Attwood
